metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29869 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
cifs-utils through 6.14, with verbose logging, can cause an informationleak when a file contains = (equal sign) characters but is not a validcredentials file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29869` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cifs-utils - 2:6.8-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cifs-utils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:6.8-1ubuntu1.2').
